activities: EMVCo, LLC (“EMVCo”) is owned by affiliates of American Express, China UnionPay, Discover, JCB, MasterCard, and Visa.  EMVCo facilitates worldwide interoperability and acceptance of secure payment transactions by developing and publishing the EMV Specifications.  EMVCo processes personal data about: (a) individual representatives of its members and participants who are located in the EU or Switzerland; (b) individual subscribers who are located in the EU or Switzerland; and (c) other users of the EMVCo website who may be accessing or using the website from the EU and Switzerland.  EMVCo’s privacy policy (located at www.emvco.com/privacy.aspx) explains how EMVCo collects, uses and shares the information it collects about these individuals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data about EMVCo members, participants, and subscribers as well as users of EMVCo’s website collected both online and offline, including manually processed data.
recoursemech: EMVCo will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
